making/cutting all the others assembly sew the 8 legs onto the bottom of the body as shown 2 legs go on each of the 4 sections bumps of the body with no legs on the head section i chose not to stuff the legs finding that they re stiff enough to keep their shape without it but you can do so if you want whenever i needed to secure yarn tails i wove them into the join on the bottom of the body which part making the stitches very close together so that there are no gaps between them when the mouth is totally covered by the secondary color cut the yarn and secure the ends claws each leg has 3 claws
